name: BLUE Sydney

reviews.text: I booked this hotel in Jan 06, prior to the change of ownership to Taj Hotels. I was not notified by Starwood until the day prior to my arrival that it was no longer a W Hotel.
reviews.title: Good base to explore Sydney

reviews.text: The Blue Hotel is a great base to explore Sydney, you can walk to the CBD, Harbour, etc and the nearest train station is ten minutes walk at the most. The rooms are starting to look a bit tired, but the standard of house keeping was very high. My room was on the top floor so there was a reasonable view of the area.
reviews.title: Fantastic
changing the sign as i entered
reviews.text: The Hotel's famous bar, was the biggest let down. The in crowd appear to have moved on, leaving a few customers behind wondering why it's not busy. Supping expensive drinks and listening to weird music. It also closes by 1 am , which is a bit weird when you come from Europe and most decent places only get going by this time .

reviews.title: Not quite there....
reviews.text: All in all the Blue is a good base, clean rooms but it's nothing special.

description: A boutique property with the reliability, consistency and attentive service of a major business hotel. Each of BLUE’s 100 Guest Rooms, including 33 stunning Loft Rooms, retain the authenticity and charm of the historic wharf building while providing the latest in modern luxury and accommodations. Each room features unique characteristics of the original heritage-listed wharf, modern decor and a view of either the eclectic Woolloomooloo Bay Village or the sensational Sydney Harbour foreshores. Recent Awards- 2012 BLUE Sydney features at No. 9 in the Top 25 Trendiest Hotels in Australia in the TripAdvisor Travellers Choice Awards- 2012 BLUE Sydney features at No. 11 in the Top 25 Trendiest Hotels in South Pacific in the TripAdvisor Travellers Choice Awards- 2012 Conde Nast UK, GOLD LIST includes BLUE Sydney - 2011 Australian Hotels Association award for Excellence – WaterBar, BLUE Sydney- 2010 Conde Nast Readers Choice Award selects BLUE as the ‘Top Hotel in Oceania’- 2010 World Travel Awards London – BLUE Sydney awarded ‘Australia’s Leading Boutique Hotel.’
